define: edit shop flash sale item, you can only edit the models in disbaled or enabled status

error_list.name: marketing_error_no_premission
error_list.description: You don't have permission for the operation

error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

error_list.description: Something is wrong. Please try later.

error_list.description: this shop flash sale is not enabled or upcoming
